summary: A simple batch file that gives you all of the divine amulets
descriptionHtml:
[b]This batch file gives you all of the amulets of the divines.

[/b]Akatosh
Arkay 
Dibella 
Julianos 
Kynareth
Mara
Stendarr
Talos
Zenithar

I made this for myself to use in creating the Hearthfire shrines - because I'm lazy and I wanted a quick and easy way to get all the amulets XD
But it's also handy for getting the amulet of Mara (you can always sell the amulets you don't want!)


To install:
drop (or copy and paste) into your skyrim directory. (NOT Data directory)
e.g C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim

When in-game press ~ key to bring up console
type "bat amulets"    (without the quotes) and press enter
and you should now have 1 of every amulet! If you want more amulets simply retype or press the 'up arrow' directional key to bring up the last console command then press 'enter'

To uninstall:
simply delete the Batch file

You are free to modify and change this file however you want to - no permission needed.
author: Lordess
